Hotmail Backdoor

30 Aug 1999

According to an article at slashdot.org, Microsoft's Hotmail service has been backdoored.

\nWhat this means basically, is that all a person needs to read your email, and send email in your name, is your user name. All the gory details(including links) can be found over here. This is a pretty serious security hole, I tried it, and can personally vouch that it works. Take the appropriate action folks..
